# amphidata SAP
```{r render-sap, eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE}

### Render the Quarto document
  quarto::quarto_render(
    input = 'sap_amphidata.qmd',
    output_format = 'html')

### Get the path to the generated HTML file
  html_file_path <- normalizePath(file.path(getwd(), 'sap_amphidata.html'))

### Display a link to the HTML file
  cat(paste0('Open the SAP document: [SAP_Amphidata.html](file:///', html_file_path, ')\n'))

```
